snippet: Mayor Cory A. Booker, appearing on Comedy Central, discussed issues like the gross national product, prisoner re-entry and income inequality.
abstract: Newark, NJ, Mayor Cory A Booker appears on Comedy Central's The Daily Show with Jon Stewart; appearance, promoted among Booker's 1.3 million Twitter followers, earns Booker praise from Stewart, who refers to him as 'the superhero mayor of Newark'.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Cory A. Booker, appearing on Comedy Central, discussed issues like the gross national product, prisoner re-entry and income inequality.

headline.seo: Newark’s Mayor, Cory Booker, Talks Policy on ‘Daily Show’
headline.main: ‘Daily Show’ Is Policy Forum for Newark’s Mayor
headline.print_headline: ‘Daily Show’ Is Policy Time For a Mayor
